description: 聊天命令注册表 - 新增命令描述翻译

replacements.description: \"Manage session-level sett: description: "管理会话级设置（例如 /session ttl）。"
replacements.description: \"Bind this Discord thread: description: "将此 Discord 线程（或新线程）绑定到会话目标。"
replacements.description: \"Remove the current Discor: description: "移除当前 Discord 线程绑定。"
replacements.description: \"List thread-bound agents: description: "列出此会话的线程绑定代理。"
